example.eg: Use a thread to tie the pieces together.
example.egtrans: 用条线把这些小块绑起来。

example.eg: There was a thread of humor running throughout his speech.
example.egtrans: 他的演讲自始至终贯穿着一种幽默。

example.eg: I glanced at the TV and quickly lost the thread of our conversation.
example.egtrans: 我瞟了一眼电视，然后很快就跟不上我们聊天的思路了。

example.eg: I'll need my glasses to thread this needle.
example.egtrans: 我需要戴上眼镜才能把线穿过这个针孔。

example.eg: The children were threading colorful beads to decorate the classroom.
example.egtrans: 孩子们正把五彩的珠子的串起来装饰教室。

example.eg: Thread the beads onto the string like this.
example.egtrans: 像这样把珠子串成一串。

example.eg: He threaded the hole so the screw would fit.
example.egtrans: 他给洞里刻上螺纹，好安螺丝。

example.eg: She threaded the film through the camera.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 安装，上, 把胶卷装在…，给…装胶卷

example.eg: A thread of smoke rose from the fireplace.
example.egtrans: 壁炉升起一缕细长的烟柱。

example.eg: A thread of light filtered between the curtains.
This screw has a very fine thread.
example.egtrans: 这枚螺丝钉的螺纹很精致。

example.eg: There were 200 comments in the thread, so I couldn't read them all.
example.egtrans: 主题讨论帖有200条评论，我没有办法尽数读完。

example.eg: Hey! Watch my threads! They're brand new!
example.egtrans: 嘿！看看我的衣服！全新的哦！

example.eg: It's hard to crochet when the kitten keeps playing with the ball of thread.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 共同的主题，贯穿的主题，相似的模式

example.eg: The Emergency Room doctor told me that my fingertip was hanging by a thread.
Sam's life hung by a thread as he struggled to come out of a coma.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 命悬一线, 千钧一发, 岌岌可危

example.eg: Expensive sheets and pillowcases usually have a very high thread count.

dsense.name: thread your way through [sth]
dsense.guideword: figurative (make your way through: crowd, etc.) (在人群中)

example.eg: We threaded our way through the crowd.
